name: T3ZO GIRLS//Reiji
description:
【﻿ＬＯＡＤＩＮＧ．．．ＣＯＭＰＬＥＴＥ：　ＴＥＺＯ_ＧＩＲＬ　Ｖ．０．4　－　REIJI】

We're almost at the super rare fifth edition! But before that, you're going to meet the fourth ever Tezo Girl: REIJI!

RESILIENCE (Rejiriensu) - the capacity to recover quickly from difficulties; toughness.

Twenty years ago when the BTC Company exploded its techno-organic bomb in a small village, they didn't count on anyone surviving.

And then, becoming a handicapped person with no arms and crawling to seek any kind of help, Reiji is rescued by the XTZ alliance.

Raised as a professional assassin, today she uses the remnants of organic technology in her body along with her guided hands to end the tyranny of the BTC Company. 

This nft is a tribute to people with physical disabilities.
